mapper.insert: insert into pdm_archive_statistics_analysis_info (product_name, product_id, product_type, archive_status, archive_time, size, archive_user, archive_task_description) values (#{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{archiveStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{archiveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{size,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{archiveUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{archiveTaskDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select product_name, product_id, product_type, archive_status, archive_time, size, archive_user, archive_task_description from pdm_archive_statistics_analysis_info
